title: How to Build a Compliant Crypto Exchange Post-Coinbase
description: Crypto isn’t going anywhere — though Coinbase might — so what the market needs is a fresh start: new exchanges that can avoid the ever-present threat of SEC enforcement by being structured correctly in the first place, writes Preston Byrne.

title: JP Morgan partners with six Indian banks for blockchain-based interbank dollar settlements
description: JP Morgan Chase & Co. has partnered with six Indian banks to launch a blockchain-powered platform for settling interbank dollar transactions in India's emerging international financial center.

title: Exploring the future of CBDCs: insights from Money20/20
description: Money2020 hosted a panel discussion titled "CBDCs: The Next Steps," featuring industry experts Claire Conby, Susan Friedman, and Teana Baker Taylor.

title: SEC Lawsuit Seen as an Attack on the Entire Industry, Calls for Unified Effort in Establishing Common Sense Rules and Guidelines
description:
The SEC alleges that Binance has accrued more than $11.6 billion since at least July 2017 through running an unregistered securities exchange. The SEC is reportedly looking for a settlement with Binance among other exchanges but has been blamed for regulating the industry through enforcement. After enjoying bountiful results during the first quarter and partially [...]

Der Beitrag SEC Lawsuit Seen as an Attack on the Entire Industry, Calls for Unified Effort in Establishing Common Sense Rules and Guidelines erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.

title: Shiba Inu News: The Arab Man Who Made $12 Million from SHIB Is On the Move Again Guess Where He is Investing Now?
description:
In the crypto market, stories of huge overnight fortunes are quite the norm. An example of the story of an anonymous Arab man who rode on the meteoric rise of Shiba Inu (SHIB) and cashed out $12 million in profit. And now there are reports of this wise Arab investor looking to strike gold again. [...]

Der Beitrag Shiba Inu News: The Arab Man Who Made $12 Million from SHIB Is On the Move Again Guess Where He is Investing Now? erschien zuerst auf Crypto News Flash.

title: Profits Await: TMS Network (TMSN) Stirs Cravings, Dwarfing BNB (BNB) And Chainlink (LINK)
description:

title: Beginner’s Guide to Cardano: Analyst Introduces Cardano Starter Pack
description:
Ben Armstrong, aka BitBoy Crypto, a prominent crypto content creator on YouTube, has recently shared a video titled “Cardano Starter Pack” aimed at assisting users in gaining a better understanding of the ADA network. The 8-minute video takes users through some of the hard-to-understand terminologies and breaks them down for common users. Don’t be intimidated […]

The post Beginner’s Guide to Cardano: Analyst Introduces Cardano Starter Pack appeared first on Coin Edition.
